metadata.title: CVE-2024-23918 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Improper conditions check in some Intel(R) Xeon(R) processor memorycontroller configurations when using Intel(R) SGX may allow a privilegeduser to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
